ygData.messageBody:
Only problem what i see that here are posible exploits but first it is not
a mass teleport of wich verant have fear as you must all start at one
location so to make a group.

At 16.57 26/05/99 +0000, you wrote:
>From: sdunn@...
>
>I've been thinking about a few new spells that Verant should implement, tell
>me what you all think. Most of these new spells is to reinforce the ability
>for wizards to travel, so far it appears that Druids are just as good, or
>even better then wizards with Spirt of the Wolf for traveling.
>
>Summon - Teleports group member inside the zone to your location

To be sure that this is not one exploit for running from combat he must be
sitting and be in full health

>Phase - Teleports yourself to location of other group member inside zone

i like this one

>Greater Summon - Teleports group member to your location, even across zones

to strong i think it gives a warriors fast transportation and annulate need
of SOW
You gate and summon

>Greater Phase - Teleports yourself to a group members location, even across
>zones

>Group Gate - Slow casting spell which teleports group to your bind spot,
>doesn't leave anyone behind

It is group teleport anywere as you as a wizard can bind an any place you
wish so you can cast evacuate from dragon lair heal by others out of group
and gate back in lair to finish wounded dragon only to mention one example

>Retreat - Evacuate version of group gate

same as above

>Haste - Increases movement rate for self only.

this can be nice two attacks, faster movement but same time for casting
spells self only spell.

>I wouldn't be opposed to seeing other classes get some or all of these
>spells, such as magicians getting Summon, Clerics Phase, druids group gate,
>etc. As a wizard, with my teleportation spells, I never bind myself in the
>city anymore, now generally only at a zone border, for quick pick up when I
>get a bit too active with my burns.
>
>Phase and Summon would be just terribly useful, as quite often the puller
>sometimes grabs a bit more then he can chew, where the magician, wizard,
>whatever can pull his bacon out of the fire so to speak.

the problem is that varant have fear thay will make advance in game too
fast if you get too powerfull transportation spells.


>Phase also would be quite useful, as the wizard, I generally get delegated
>to go on town runs (by the way, great way of making money, buy silver/copper
>for plat, various weapons. Just gate back to the bank, or the nearest gate
>to your town and sell sell sell) and sometimes my group wandered off
>somewhere, or I don't want to run through nasties to get to my group. So
>far I lost about half a level in Najena as I've discovered Orges can see
>invis. It would be nice not having to deal with them.
>
>
>Fastus Atrox,
>26th level Dark Elf Wizard, The Rathe
